text: Mont Tekao. Tekao is the highest peak on the island of Nuku Hiva, in the Marquesas Islands. It is located in the northwest corner of the island, along the border of the Tōvii plateau, in the traditional province of Te Ii. It rises to an elevation of above sea level. Category:Landforms of the Marquesas Islands Category:Mountains of French Polynesia
title: Tekao
